column6: * SALES FOR PETROLEUM ADDITIVES SEGMENT FOR Q1 OF 2018 WERE $586.9 MILLION, UP 8.7% VERSUS SAME PERIOD LAST YEAR
column7: * THROUGHOUT REST OF 2018, EXPECT TO SEE SOLID SALES AND SHIPMENTS IN PETROLEUM ADDITIVES BUSINESS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
